content: 3 chain 1 turn 36 sts r13 11 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next st x 3 chain 1 turn 39 sts r14 12 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next st x 3 chain 1 turn 42 sts r15 13 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next st x 3 chain 1 turn 45 sts r16 14 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next st x 3 48 sts cut yarn pull end through the loop weave in end make 2 wedges per color finishing lay the 2 wedges on top of each other crochet or seam them together along the edges stuff before closing seam the stuffed wedges together with the straight edges towards the middle happy crochet page 4 of 4
